data.text: @lewishutchison1 @trentconsultant Roll out for these groups is filtering through now 💙💉👏🏼
@trentconsultant type 1 diabetics waiting and other people with medical conditions still waiting for theirs!
@SarahJTodd @trentconsultant Sensible. I wondered how Welsh colleagues were getting second doses before 10 weeks when in England we close clinics rather than give second doses to anybody.
@SarahJTodd @trentconsultant If supply is the problem the large hubs wouldn’t be trying (and failing) to book people in I think.

@Oldboatie @trentconsultant Yes.
And...
Surely we need to be testing high risk elderly & CEV/immunocompromised patients to see if they're actually making neutralising antibody response. I know I haven't (on immunosuppressants). We may need to be giving them their 2nd doses earlier...
https://t.co/XrsjSceJCN

@Oldboatie @trentconsultant https://t.co/jGfVpjFa1b
Wales are starting to roll out 2nd doses now. I know some HCPs who are now having their 2nd dose at 5 weeks. That should have been the headline here! Did anyone else spot that among the blurb? Well done Wales!! I wish we could follow suit. https://t.co/udOz8T6N1L

@SarahJTodd @trentconsultant I’d happily drive to a centre for a second dose, or my 59 year old husband for first. The JVT “which old person do you want to deprive of their first dose” argument no longer operates as most over 70s have had first dose now.
@SarahJTodd @trentconsultant If they are that quiet they could both, get on with second doses, and invite all 50-70s. That would keep them busy (as they should be).
@Oldboatie @trentconsultant It is absolutely ridiculous. I am disgusted. At least Wales has more sense.

@trentconsultant Surely we need to be testing high risk elderly & CEV/immunocompromised patients to see if they are actually making neutralising antibody response. I know I haven't (on immunosuppressants). We may need to be giving them their 2nd doses earlier...

@trentconsultant This now appears ideological. Clearly there is supply to these vaccination centres or they wouldn’t have appointments available. Forbidden to give second doses despite standing empty.
